::SnowCat::

She saw Lunapine in the hall and walked up to him. "Who are you?" 
She knew that for him to enter the ark, the scanners and automated 
systems had to have let him in. But she had never seen him before and 
was wary of the new bot. She sniff the air around him and picked up 
the scent of Maximal from him.  She transformed into bot mde and 
looked at him, waiting for him to reply.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpine approached the Ark, it was still in multiple pieces, 
mostly
> scattered on the ground. He remembered the scanners and wondered if 
they'd
> recognize him. The scanners clicked, beeped and the door slid open, 
he may
> have had a new body but Veratis had used the same DNA scans from 
his old
> body. Sounds echoed through the halls which made it sound as if the 
ship was
> speaking to him. he heard Ramulus explaining something and decided 
to see
> what his associate was up to.. It sounded like preperation for a 
battle,
> maybe Lunarpine would get the chance to test out his new body after 
all.
